title: Bottled water consumption per capita in Europe 2017 , by country
summary: This bar chart has 26 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Litres consumed per capita in each Country on the y axis.
The Litres consumed per capita is highest at Country Italy and lowest at Country Sweden.
The maximum Country Italy has got 18.8 times higher Litres consumed per capita than the minimum Country Sweden.
